Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry for waking you up. My husband has
come back from his trip and so we've
come to say hello.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Oh, you're <MYNAME>, are you? I've heard
all about you in Hana's letters.
<PAGE>
<NAME_UNKOWN>My name is <BLUE>Kosaburo</BLUE>. Do you like
fishing, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm a master fisherman, if you can
believe it. Ask me anything you like
about fishing! Great to meet you!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now my husband is back I'm going to
start a <GREEN>Fishing Shop</GREEN> at Hana's House.
<PAGE>
We'll be selling everything you need in
order to fish, including <BLUE>fishing bait</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
My husband is a bit of a character but
I'm sure we'll all get along.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
